name: Quantumville
description:
Explore the world of quantum mechanics in this click based story where you take on the persona of Louis de Broglie.  After taking an unfortunate hit on the head, you find yourself in a strange village of Quantumville, where the laws of quantum mechanics govern reality.  Explore the particle in a box model as you help the inhabitants of Quantumville solve a serious predicament...

NOTES:  Quantumville is currently in prototype form, and was initially conceived at North Carolina State University in the Advanced Physical Chemistry (CH 730) course in the Fall of 2019.
